brass.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a very hard bright yellow metal that is a mixture of copper and zinc
brass.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: musical instruments that are made of metal, such as the trumpet and the trombone
brass.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: the people in an orchestra or band who play musical instruments that are made of metal
brass.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: an object made of brass, usually with a design cut into it, or several brass objects
brass.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: the top managers in an organization
